name: Riti Malhotra
about: Banker turned Product Manager. After a great stint as Product head at Phonon…

people_also_viewed.name: Animesh Srivastava
people_also_viewed.about: Product @ Capillary | CRM, Payments, eCommerce, Web3 | IIM-L, IIT-BHU

people_also_viewed.name: Anshul Sharma
people_also_viewed.about: Senior Director of Product Management at SymphonyAI

recommendations: Karan Vashisht “I had the privilege of collaborating with Riti at Dunzo for a year, and I'm pleased to recommend her as an exceptional professional. Riti's meticulous attention to detail and ownership of projects are truly commendable. She excels in stakeholder management, aligning diverse perspectives towards common goals. Riti's dedication to solving complex problems is remarkable. She contributed significantly to the Brand Monetisation project by devising innovative real estate strategies that generated new revenue streams for our app. Riti's involvement in the Search project highlighted her prowess in handling intricate search algorithms involving mathematical intricacies and backend logic. Her contributions substantially improved user engagement and satisfaction. While Riti maintains a strict approach to ensure quality, her intent to solve complex problems shines through. She is open to innovative solutions, even though she could explore more flexible data-backed decision-making. In the Shopping Experience project, Riti's problem-solving skills were evident in enhancing SKU discovery on our app. Her impact was notable, positively influencing customer engagement. It was a privilege to work with Riti, and I recommend her wholeheartedly. Her technical acumen, stakeholder management skills, and determination to excel make her an asset to any team.”

Somendra Patel “I've had the pleasure of working with Riti for 2 years on various projects. She always kept the team morale up. I feel she is the best manager I've ever had because of her positivity, her ability to work through a crisis and come up with innovative ways to achieve the goals.”
